title: Child taken by Trotwood squad from reported shooting
content:
UPDATE @ 3:20 p.m.
Police said a child was taken to the hospital, but further details were not released.
When our crew arrived there were several Trotwood police cruisers on scene. Two juveniles were observed, including one who appeared distraught and emotional.
Trotwood police said they would issue a statement about what happened.
FIRST REPORT
Police and medics in Trotwood are responding to a reported shooting in the 4000 block of Mayview Drive.
The shooting was reported shortly after 2 p.m.
According to scanner traffic, a family member called in to report a male had been shot.
We’re working to learn more and will provide updates as more information becomes available.
